user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding a comfortable and supportive wireless bra that fits well and meets quality expectations.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and supportive wireless bra that would fit well and provide all-day comfort. However, the product I received did not meet my expectations as one cup size seemed smaller than the other, and the straps were frayed, indicating poor quality control.
I needed a wireless bra that offered good coverage and support. Unfortunately, I received the wrong size, which made it unusable, and the loose seams suggested a lack of quality in the product.

I was attracted to the idea of a comfortable, seamless wireless bra that promised support and a sleek look. However, the product did not match the description, arriving in the wrong size and color, with seams ripping, which was disappointing.

I sought a wireless bra that combined support and comfort, particularly one that would lift and shape without discomfort. Unfortunately, the product did not fit at all and the material was subpar, leading to dissatisfaction.
I was looking for a bra that promised comfort and support, but the product I received was far from what was described, with a terrible fit and material quality.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, functional, and made from high-quality materials. I value items that fit well and provide a good range of motion, especially for active wear. I appreciate a variety of color options and styles that allow for personal expression. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that have poor fabric quality, show signs of wear quickly, or do not match their descriptions. I find it frustrating when items are poorly constructed, have sizing issues, or are made from materials that are see-through or uncomfortable.

conversation.content: I want a comfortable and supportive wireless bra that fits well and meets quality expectations. within my expected price range: [12.99, 37.5]
What specific features or design elements do you prioritize in a wireless bra for it to be considered supportive and comfortable to you?
I prioritize a wireless bra that offers good coverage and support without compromising on comfort. It should fit well, have adjustable straps, and be made from high-quality, soft materials.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, Cool Comfort Fabric> / Item ID: B08W788HPF / Price: $20.78 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers tell us that Bali's Comfort Revolution® full-coverage wireless bra is the most comfortable bra they've ever worn. We're not surprised. Sleek and seamless, it's made of moisture-wicking Cool Comfort® fabric that keeps you cool and comfortble. It's smartly engineered with strategically targeted two-ply side and back support, so you look your smoothest and shapeliest from every angle. Support comes from ultra-thin foam cups that stretch for a flexible fit. Bali's Comfort Band gently flexes to move with you for even more comfort. And the Comfort-U® design keeps the back and adjustable straps right in place. Available in a range of colors and jacquard textures, and in multiple size options, so you're sure to find the color and size that works for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Wireless Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Full-Coverage Bra, DF3488> / Item ID: B08YXLHV18 / Price: $28.14 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Fall in love with the comfort of Bali's Comfort Revolution® full-coverage wireless bra. Destined to become your go-to, everday favorite for working out or just hanging out, its four-way stretch fabric flexes and moves with you. At the same time, strategically placed reinforced zones provide the support and shaping you need, including at the underband and around the cups. Its seamless design delivers a sleek, smooth look under even the clingiest clothes. And here's a bonus: Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking fabric that helps keep you cool, calm, and collected. This is a seamless, wireless, matchless bra to put on and forget. Available in so many size options, so you're sure to find your perfect fit."]
